CosmereScadrial.Defs.AllomanticAbilityDe.label: Iron Aura
CosmereScadrial.Defs.AllomanticAbilityDe.description: Reveals nearby sources of metal by tracing fine blue lines through the air. Each line points toward a metal object — coin, armor, blade — waiting to be pushed. These lines shimmer with the tension of potential force, visible only to those burning Iron.
